content.rendered: The 12 cabin crew members from Indigo were in for a surprise when they walked into the Mission Education center in Delhi and were greeted with shiny, smiling faces. The entire team was present to support child education and conducted a fun story telling session with the children. The children were given chart papers to put their imagination on paper and narrate a story based on their drawings. Refreshments were provided to the students at the end of the programme. The children had immense fun and so did the team from Indigo.
